---
title: "Understanding AMOC dynamics with Manifold Learning"
author: Alessandro Raganato & Annalisa Bracco
date: ""
---

This is the main project of my PhD research. We can interpret the interpret the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) as a complex multidimensional dynamical system. Following Lucarini et al (2016), the dynamics of the AMOC is confined over a lower dimensional manifold.
